org.trianacode.taskgraph.tool

Interface ToolListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BrokenToolMonitor, CompilePanel, Serialize, ToolTableImpl, ToolTreeModel, TrianaHttpServer, UnitPanel

    public interface ToolListener
    An interface implemented by classes that wish to be notified when tools are added or removed.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
